syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

topic.topic_name: An introduction to A Level organic chemistry

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Shapes of aromatic organic molecules; σ and π bonds

learning_objectives.description: describe and explain the shape of benzene and other aromatic molecules, including sp² hybridisation, in terms of σ bonds and a delocalised π system
